entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
